name: Helicopter Mission (itch)
description:
Try to complete all missions. Destroy all Tanks, pickup all survivors, and get through all icebergs (Shoot at the flickering tip of the icebergs)

Keys:

Move :     W/X      Or:     Up-arrow/Bottom-arrow     Or:     Keypad 8/2

Shoot: Spacebar (when possible)

Use mouse in menus (left click)
